author: brekke
msg: Bringing our POM up to date and regen'd the build.xml

author: dfs
msg: Added a version of io.Util.copyStream that lets you specify whether or
not to flush the output stream.  Changed FTPClient retrieveFile and
__storeFile to not flush.

author: rwinston
msg: Remove the POP3 tests from the default test target for now - Gump was complaining. It would be  nice to be able to e.g. programmatically start James for the purposes of NNTP and POP3 testing. Maybe later.
